menu.prompt: Welcome to the Obstacle Course! Do you want to hear the rules, or learn about your options, or play the game, or quit?
menu.nomatch: I didn't understand. You can say Play the game or Hear the rules or Learn my options or Quit.

block.prompt: The rules are simple. You are entering a course with three obstacles. To win, you have to pass them all without failing too many times. I'll guide you through the course. Listen closely and choose what to do in every situation. Just remember... choose wisely.
You can choose between two courses, the nice course and the nasty course. You can choose to play as three different characters, Hermione, Humpty Dumpty and Hannibal.

initial.name: preferences
initial.prompt: Time to play! What course and character would you like?

nomatch.prompt: You can choose your course and your character.
You can say for example I want to play the nice course as Humpty Dumpty.
I'm not sure I caught that. I'll ask you about the course and the character separately.

field.name: courseChoice
field.prompt: What course do you want to play?
You can choose between the nice course and the nasty course.

field.name: characterChoice
field.prompt: Who do you want to play as?
You can choose between Hermione, Humpty Dumpty or Hannibal.

if.prompt: You have tries to make it through. For each obstacle, you can either climb, bow and shake or use a chainsaw.

block.prompt: You have tries to make it through. For each obstacle, you can either cast a spell, run and hide or offer food.

field.name: wizardAction
field.prompt: You meet with an old and mighty wizard. What do you do?
You can climb, bow and shake or use a chainsaw

if.prompt: The wizard says, Have a nice day! and lets you pass.
No. He is too old and will probably die.
No! You cannot be that blood-thirsty!
Oh no, you died!

filled.prompt: You now have tries left. Don't be foolish now.

field.name: wallAction
field.prompt: Now you are standing in front of a huge wall. What do you do?
You can climb, bow and shake or use a chainsaw

if.prompt: Yes! The chainsaw gets you through!
Sorry, the wall is too high.

filled.prompt: You now have tries left. Choose your next move wisely.

field.name: elephantAction
field.prompt: You are now standing in front of an enormous Indian elephant. What do you do?
You can climb, bow and shake or use a chainsaw

if.prompt: Congratulations! You are now riding the elephant!

if.prompt: You got away with come injuries. You can continue.

filled.prompt: You now have tries left. Think ahead!

field.name: dragonAction
field.prompt: You encounter a red-eyed dragon with 10 inch teeth and smoking nostrils. What do you do?
You can run and hide, offer food or cast a spell.

if.prompt: You are lucky! The dragon instantly turned into a frog!
Running will only buy you some time.
You can only feed a dragon with yourself.
